p: On the contrary, other EOsâ€™ activities are related to potentiating immune responses, such as improving serum lymphocyte proliferation rate, phagocytosis rate, immunoglobulin (Ig) G, IgA, IgM, C3, and C4 levels in piglets [ 131]. These results were recently confirmed by similar studies, demonstrating an increase of IgG and IgM after plant EO supplementation [ 132].
